mtte.configFlattenStructureHint: When this option is enabled and a folder contains only one scene, Moulinette will not display the folder but only the scene to avoid cluttering the tree structure.
mtte.configHideEmptyFoldersHint: When checked, Moulinette will not display folders that do not contain scenes
mtte.obsidianExporterDescription: This utility allows you to export the current world to Obsidian format. Choose below which documents you want to export and the permissions to apply.
